title: Baked Apricot Chicken
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Watch Now
In a medium bowl combine the jam, dressing and soup mix. Mix together. Watch Now
Place chicken pieces in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour apricot mixture over chicken and bake uncovered in the preheated oven for 50 to 60 minutes. Watch Now
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
